item.title: Need a Command to change spell books
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

if (command.startsWith("switch") && playerRights >= 0){ if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Command to change spell books

item.title: Need a Command to change spell books
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“WrittenBlade, post:4, topic:229190”][quote author=krandolv link=topic=301462.msg2421813#msg2421813 date=1220386389]
im using deltascape’s source and im kinda a n00b coder so im getting a 4 errors after i fixed sendMessage

client.java:7506: cannot find symbol symbol : method anitmation(int,int,int) location: class client animation(435, absY, absX); ^ client.java:7508: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ancients location: class client if (ancients == 1) { ^ client.java:7510: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ancients location: class client ancients = ); ^ client.java:7514: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ancients location: class client ancients = 1;
[/quote]
You need to declare the variable ancients and make them save to the moreinfo.[/quote]

No… he justs needs the right variables for the Deltascape source. I don’t have Deltascape so… I can’t help but you dont need to make new variables when Deltascape already has them but different.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Command to change spell books
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

[quote=“krandolv, post:3, topic:229190”]im using deltascape’s source and im kinda a n00b coder so im getting a 4 errors after i fixed sendMessage

client.java:7506: cannot find symbol symbol : method anitmation(int,int,int) location: class client animation(435, absY, absX); ^ client.java:7508: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ancients location: class client if (ancients == 1) { ^ client.java:7510: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ancients location: class client ancients = ); ^ client.java:7514: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ancients location: class client ancients = 1;[/quote]
You need to declare the variable ancients and make them save to the moreinfo.

item.source: Need a Command to change spell books

item.title: Need a Command to change spell books
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

If you mean from Reg to Antients, then do this.

if (command.startsWith("switch") && playerRights >= 0){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } } //By Tonypker13- Edited for Oldkoscape

Read full topic
